title: Campagnolo Gran Fondo New York 2016
desc: Be a Pro for a Day in the 2016 GFNY Championship at Campagnolo Gran Fondo New York on May 15, 2016. The challenging and competitive 100-mile Gran Fondo course from New York City to Bear Mountain and back is an experience for anyone from elite amateur to first time finisher. Also available: GFNY BEAR, a 50 mile ride from NYC to Bear Mountain. Same hoopla plus return transportation. For more information about Campagnolo Gran Fondo New York, please visit the event website at  .
